scripts.format: npm run stop && docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/app -w /app node:18.8 sh -c "npm install -g prettier && prettier --config .tools/prettier/.prettierrc --ignore-path .tools/prettier/.prettierignore --write ."
scripts.check: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/app -w /app node:18.8 sh -c "npm install -g prettier && prettier --config .tools/prettier/.prettierrc --ignore-path .tools/prettier/.prettierignore --check ."
